name: Planet Invaders
description:
Summary

You play as four cute alien blobs who fight to the death for rule over the galaxy,  so grab your friends for some screen gazing, friendship breaking split-screen!! Planet hop to enemy planets! Collect your resources! Fight for survival! 

-Important Note-

The game was created with four player split-screen in mind and is meant to be played in a relaxed position with game controllers. So far we've only tested the game with Xbox One controllers so it is recommended you do so! Planet Invaders is a game project created by Academy of Interactive Entertainment students in 2018.

Movement Controls:

Left Analog Stick - Character Movement

Right Analog Stick - Camera Movement

Select Button - Warp Menu

A - Jump

Combat Controls:

X - Basic Attack

Left Bumper - Whirlwind Attack

Right Bumper - Missile Attack

Defensive Controls:

Left Trigger - Bubble Shield

Right Trigger - Dash

Programmers:

Max Guidry
